title: [Placements] Any info abt the Walmart Cybersecurity internship process?
content:
There wasn’t much info in the mail, and I couldn’t find anything online either, so I’m hoping any seniors who’ve gone through the process can share their experience.

* What was the **Online Assessment (OA)** format? Was it a **CTF-style** challenge, or the usual **DSA + MCQ** based test?
* How many rounds were there, and what were they like?
* What kind of questions were asked in the **technical** and **HR** interviews?

Any input from those who’ve appeared for this would be greatly appreciated even brief pointers or tips would help a lot.

Thanks in advance to anyone willing to help!

comments.body: Omg same role Wal-Mart came today for vit too

Also did any senior get ppo after internship?  
(Its mentioned perf based but im skeptical)
have you guys gotten any more details about the process since then?
